definitions.definition: A rural habitation of size between a hamlet and a town .
examples: There are 2 churches and 3 shops in our village .

definitions.definition: A rural habitation that has a church , but no market .
A planned community such as a retirement community or shopping district .
An exclusive gated community ; a subdivision .
examples: There are six blocks in our village , each having ten lots.

main_definition: A rural habitation of size between a hamlet and a town .
secondary_definitions: ( British ) A rural habitation that has a church , but no market .
( Australia ) A planned community such as a retirement community or shopping district .
( Philippines ) An exclusive gated community ; a subdivision .
